title: Patch 5.10 (issues updating)
body:
Whilst Downloading the newest patch my internet may have dropped mid download, causing me to go into a loop of "An Unspecified Error Has Occurred" after searching throughout the web so far most people just tell me to re-install the game, is there not a way to just re-install said patch?

Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
LOL!! After finding solutions how to get pass 2%. All i had to do is add "S_OK",

Thanks to the guy who came up with this idea..

I would try:

- Locate, and delete, the following two sub-folders:

Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads
Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions

- Then try to patch again!

By default the Riot Games folder can be located in your C: drive. Let me know how this goes. :)

Please help me! I did deleting it but has the same problem. Infact im having this problem since patch 5.2. After every patch release my patch will do this "Unspecefied error has occured" thingy! However after 1-2 weeks suddenly the patcher starts patching and i can play the game. Please help me!

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=0e1TWxsp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-29T09:36:41.518+0000)
>
> If you'd like something that works a bit faster, try the following:
> 
> Step 1) Open windows explorer.
> 
> Step 2) Navigate to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\"
> 
> Step 3) Create a new, empty file in the latest version folder named "S_OK", with no extension. Restart League with admin privileges.
yep got this issue too and both ways have not helped. instead of having 33% on the side now at 0% calculating differences scanning all the files
Are you installing to the default path?

If you'd like something that works a bit faster, try the following:

Step 1) Open windows explorer.

Step 2) Navigate to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\"

Step 3) Create a new, empty file in the latest version folder named "S_OK", with no extension. Restart League with admin privileges.
